name: jira-clone-angular
description: A simplified Jira clone built with Angular 9 and Firebase

scripts.install-dependencies: npm run install-dependencies-front && npm run install-dependencies-back
scripts.start:front: npm run install-dependencies-front && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.build:back: npm run install-dependencies-back && cd backend && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run install-dependencies && npm run build:back && npm run build:front
